summary: The diff partially implements requirements REQ-8, REQ-9, and REQ-10, but is missing the complete implementation of REQ-7 (rest timer). Some hallucinated features exist around workout plan selection UI and dashboard statistics that were not explicitly requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a rest timer feature that allows users to set and track rest periods of 1-2 minutes between sets during workout logging
missing_requirements.reason: No rest timer component or functionality is visible in WorkoutLogger.tsx. No timer UI, countdown logic, or audio/visual notifications are implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Users can select a workout plan to follow during workout logging
missing_requirements.reason: WorkoutLogger.tsx shows no UI or logic for selecting and following an existing workout plan. Only manual exercise entry is visible in the truncated diff.

hallucinated_features.description: ProgressDashboard displays 'Workout Plans' statistic card with totalPlans count
hallucinated_features.reason: While totalPlans is now tracked in the backend (REQ-8), the BuildRequest does not specify displaying workout plan statistics in the dashboard. Only totalWorkouts and totalVolume were mentioned in progress tracking requirements.
